articles.title: CNBC Daily Open: Everyone's watching the Netflix deal
articles.description: Despite an initial show of resistance to the Netflix-Warner Bros. Discovery deal, stranger things have happened in the Trump administration.
articles.content:
"Who's watching?" Netflix asks whenever someone accesses its site. On Friday, it was probably everyone with an interest in business, markets and television.
The key characters that had people hooked were Netflix and Warner Bros. Discovery , which joi... [2310 chars]

articles.title: Nancy’s Stranger Things Spinoff Officially Changes The Netflix Franchise’s Future
articles.description: With the announcement of Nancy Wheeler's spinoff, Stranger Things has officially changed the trajectory of the franchise in a way that may not work.
articles.content: The news that a Nancy Wheeler spinoff will be released after Stranger Things season 5 reinforces the reality of the franchise’s future, whether fans like it or not. After over three years of waiting, Stranger Things season 5 volume 1 is finally here.... [4298 chars]

articles.title: Stranger Things season 5 table read sees cast stunned by huge twist
articles.description: Netflix's hour-long table read video for Stranger Things season 5 episode four shows the cast's emotional reactions
articles.content:
Stranger Things 5 - Volume 1 trailer
Stranger Things season five is set to return to Netflix imminently, with volume two dropping on December 25 in the US and December 26 in the UK.

articles.title: Netflix Has Officially Found Its Stranger Things Replacement In $9.5B Franchise
articles.description: Stranger Things is ending with season 5, but Netflix has secured it's future after acquiring some major new IPs that could fill the slate.
articles.content: The success of Stranger Things has been monumental for Netflix over the years, but now, they've potentially gotten their hands on a much larger franchise that could take its place going forward. With the news that Netflix has agreed to purchase and t... [2330 chars]

articles.title: Stranger Things: Netflix Hints at Byler as the 'Endgame' Ship
articles.description: Stranger Things has been filled with different ships between characters, but the most recent ship is Byler, and it appears Netflix has picked a side.
articles.content: Warning: Spoilers ahead for Stranger Things season 5, volume 1Stranger Things has been filled with different ships between characters since it began in 2016. It’s either team Steve and Nancy or Nancy and Jonathan, but the most recent ship is Byler, a... [1756 chars]

articles.title: ‘Stranger Things 5 ‘loses its number 1 spot on Netflix to Sean-Diddy Combs’ controversial docuseries - Details inside
articles.description: News News: In just a week, 'Stranger Things 5', which topped Netflix charts after its release, has lost its number 1 position to a new docuseries about Sean Diddy Combs amidst growing controversy.
articles.content: Anticipation for 'Stranger Things 5' was immense, with its release crashing platforms and topping charts. However, the highly-rated series lost its number one Netflix spot within a week. A new docuseries on Sean 'Diddy' Combs, fueled by controversy, ... [2288 chars]

articles.title: The Duffer Brothers say that surprise character return in Stranger Things "immediately changes the tone" in season 5 Vol. 2: "I think it'll be surprising for people to see how she ultimately fits into
articles.description: Stranger Things season 5 Vol. 2 hits Netflix on Christmas
articles.content:
That surprise return of Eleven's 'sister' in Stranger Things season 5 Volume 1 had some fans (me) in tears – and the Duffer brothers say this is only just the beginning of her
"It will be a very different dynamic going into the second volume," Matt e... [1853 chars]

articles.title: Five Netflix Shows Like ‘Stranger Things’ To Watch While Waiting For Volume 2
articles.description: Stranger Things Volume 2 is not out for a while, so here are five other sci-fi shows on Netflix to tide you over until it returns.
articles.content:
It is 20 days to Christmas, and while you may be excited to get presents, you are also waiting for Stranger Things Volume 2, given Netflix’s desire to split it up into three parts and release them all on holidays.
Well, that’s quite a wait, so you ma... [2361 chars]

articles.title: DC x Stranger Things: Fans erupt with memes after Netflix’s Warner Bros takeover
articles.description: Trending News: Netflix's acquisition of Warner Bros triggered a wave of internet meme chaos, with fans envisioning wild crossovers between DC, Stranger Things, and L
articles.content: Netflix's acquisition of Warner Bros triggered a wave of internet meme chaos, with fans envisioning wild crossovers between DC, Stranger Things, and Looney Tunes. Jokes also targeted Netflix's algorithm, with users fearing autoplay and endless realit... [2399 chars]
